fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only use your ability on Night 3 exactly.
- You can't be prevented from using your ability by any means.
- Your ability can't be stopped or interfered with by any means.
- You can't die at night until Night 3.
- You can't claim your role until you use your ability.
- If you claim your role or a situation arises in which it's extremely obviously you're your role, you're removed from the game.
- You can't not use your ability.
